All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
Base class for Actions.
ActionList
A thin wrapper for java.util.ArrayList<Action> that does not allow nulls to be added.
Actor
An entity that is alive by having hit points.
ActorLocationsIterator
Represents a bimap of locations and actors.
Application
 
Application
 
Application
The main class to start the game.
Archetype
A class representing the combat archetypes or the starting classes of the Actor.
ArchetypeManager
A Archetype manager class that allows users to select the archetype starting class.
AreaAttackAction
An attack action that targets all the actors in the surroundings of the attacker.
AttackAction
An Action to attack another Actor.
AttackBehaviour
A behaviour that allow NPC to attack to other actor.

A class representing the Bandit combat archetype of the Actor.

A factory for creating actions.

A collection of Capability objects.

An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum.
Club
A weapon that is carried by the Wretch.
Consumable
A Consumable interface represents the item that can be consumed by the Actor in the Elden Ring game to achieve some goals.
ConsumeAction
An Action for Actor to consume some special items that can be consumed in the game.

Floor

A class representing Hammer type weapon.
HarmlessEnemy
A class representing the Harmless Enemy in the game, who causes no harm to the other actors, and is formed temporarily on the Game Map due to the death of specific Enemy in the game.

Action to allow weapons to be picked up.
PileOfBones
A Harmless Enemy called Pile Of Bones, who will not attack any other actors in the game, and is formed due to the death of Heavy Skeletal Swordsman and Skeletal Bandit.

Class representing the Player.

Class representing the Player.
Printable
Things that are Printable can appear in the user interface and therefore can be represented by a character in the UI.
PuddleOfWater
A type of ground that can spawn crustacean enemies.
Purchasable
A Purchasable interface represents a weapon item that a player can buy from the trader.
PurchaseAction
An Action for Actor to purchase certain items from the trader.
QuickStepAction
A special skill action that is provided by Great Knife, such that the actor can move away from the target after the attack, and evade the attack from target.
RandomNumberGenerator
A random number generator Created by:
ResetAction
An Action for Actor to reset the whole game.
ResetManager
A reset manager class that manages a list of resettables.
Resettable
A Resettable interface represents the object (includes Actor, Item and so on) that can be reset in the Elden Ring game when the player is dead / the player rest at Site of Lost Grace.
RestAction
An Action for Actor to rest at the Site of Lost Grace.
Runes
A class representing money currency used in the Elden Ring game.
RunesManager
A class that manages Runes object like transaction of runes, increment or decrement of runes amount.
RunesRewarder
A RunesRewarder interface represents a kind of objective that a source of runes in the Elden Ring game can have.
Samurai
A class representing the Samurai combat archetype of the Actor.
Scimitar
A weapon that is carried by the Skeletal Bandit.
Sellable
A Sellable interface represents a weapon item that a player can sell to the trader.
SellAction
An Action for Actor to purchase certain items from the trader.
SiteOfLostGrace
An unique ground that allows player to rest on it.
SkeletalBandit
A Skeleton type of enemy called Skeletal Bandit.
Skeleton
A class representing the enemy type called Skeleton.
